title: Rage Against the Machine:2008 Jan. 28th, Melbourne[flac]
description:
Big Day Out, Flemington Racecourse
Melbourne, Australia
28th January, 2008

Recorded by Chris Jacques
Bootlist here: <a href="
http://db.etree.org/SeanceMascara" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://db.etree.org/SeanceMascara</a>
More live recordings via my myspace:

Recorded with:
Church Audio STC-11 > Church Audio ST-9100 w/Bass Rolloff at 80hz > iRiver iHP-120 w/Rockbox installed

Transfer:
iRiver iHP-120 > Sony Sound Forge 8 (Raised Volume +5dB right channel, +6.1db left channel, Fade In/Out, Splits) > FLAC Frontend (Level cool1.gif > FLAC


Recording Notes:
Show was recorded in the D-Barrier on the elft side of stage. The volume may change due to not having a clear sight of the
speaker stacks: and from my insane dancing around. It wasn&#039;t my best attempt at recording but to be honest, I was more concerned
about having a good time at possibly the only time in my life I&#039;ll ever get to see Rage.
Microphones were clipped to the brim of a hat about 6ft from the ground and spaced 6 inches apart.



Setlist:
1.  Intro
2.  Testify
3.  Bulls On Parade
4.  People of The Sun
5.  Bombtrack
6.  Down Rodeo
7.  Bullet In The Head
8.  Know Your Enemy
9.  Tire Me
10. Guerilla Radio
11. Calm Like A Bomb
12. Sleep Now In The Fire
13. Wake Up

14. Public Service Announcement

15. Freedom
16. Killing In The Name
